name: next-story
description: Proof of Concept project, to demonstrate the integration of the chosen tech stack to customers.
author: Daniel Dogeanu <contact@danieldogeanu.com> (https://danieldogeanu.com/)

scripts.copy-types: cd backend && npm run types && cd .. && node scripts/copy-strapi-types.js
scripts.compose-prod: docker compose -f compose.prod.yml --profile all --env-file .env --env-file prod.env up
scripts.compose-prod:backend: docker compose -f compose.prod.yml --profile backend --env-file .env --env-file prod.env up
scripts.compose-prod:frontend: docker compose -f compose.prod.yml --env-file .env --env-file prod.env up ns_nextjs_prod
scripts.compose-prod:build: docker compose -f compose.prod.yml --profile all --env-file .env --env-file prod.env build --no-cache
scripts.compose-prod:build:backend: docker compose -f compose.prod.yml --profile backend --env-file .env --env-file prod.env build --no-cache
scripts.compose-prod:build:frontend: docker compose -f compose.prod.yml --env-file .env --env-file prod.env build ns_nextjs_prod --no-cache
scripts.compose-prod:recreate: docker compose -f compose.prod.yml --profile all --env-file .env --env-file prod.env up --force-recreate --renew-anon-volumes
scripts.compose-prod:recreate:backend: docker compose -f compose.prod.yml --profile backend --env-file .env --env-file prod.env up --force-recreate --renew-anon-volumes
scripts.compose-prod:recreate:frontend: docker compose -f compose.prod.yml --env-file .env --env-file prod.env up ns_nextjs_prod --force-recreate --renew-anon-volumes
